response:
"warum gibt es immer noch companies, die unsere personlichen daten sammeln und missbrauchen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #security"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and misuse our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and misuse personal data, highlighting the importance of data protection, privacy, and security. the hashtags #datenschutz, #privatsphäre, and #security emphasize the topic and reach a wider audience interested in these issues.
